executive_summary: The audit of the system indicates a satisfactory performance and compliance status. All agents are actively engaged, and the system meets the required security, performance, and reliability standards. However, there are areas for improvement in reducing anomalies and optimizing resource usage.

performance_analysis.memory_usage: Memory usage is at 64.04%, indicating a moderate level of resource consumption.
performance_analysis.api_latency: API latency is at 104.04 ms, which may need monitoring to ensure it remains within acceptable thresholds.
performance_analysis.throughput: Throughput is at 104.04, indicating efficient processing capabilities.

key_findings: All agents are performing their roles effectively with equal distribution of activities.
The system is compliant with security, performance, and reliability standards.
Three anomalies were detected, suggesting potential areas for further investigation.
recommendations: Investigate the causes of the detected anomalies to prevent future occurrences.
Monitor API latency to ensure it remains within acceptable limits.
Consider optimizing memory usage to improve overall system efficiency.
